member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterColorConverter
member.summary: Converts between LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) System.Windows.Media.Color objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterColorConverter.FromColor(Color)
member.summary: Converts a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) System.Windows.Media.Color object to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterColorConverter.ToColor(Leadtools.RasterColor)
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterColor object to a a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) System.Windows.Media.Color object.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterImageConverter
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage to and from Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) image objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterImageConverter.ConvertFromSource(ImageSource,Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertFromSourceOptions)
member.summary: Converts a WPF System.Windows.Media.ImageSource object to LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage.
member.param: The System.Windows.Media.ImageSource object containing the image data to convert.
Options to control the conversion operation. Currently there are no extra options and the value of this parameter must be set to ConvertFromSourceOptions.None
member.returns: A Leadtools.RasterImage object representing the converted image.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterImageConverter.ConvertToSource(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions)
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS for .NET Leadtools.RasterImage object to WPF System.Windows.Media.ImageSource.
member.param: The Leadtools.RasterImage object containing the image data to convert.
Options to control the conversion operation. The following values can be ORed together:
member.returns: An System.Windows.Media.ImageSource object representing the converted image.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterImageConverter.ConvertToSource(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions,System.Double)
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS for .NET Leadtools.RasterImage object to WPF System.Windows.Media.ImageSource.
member.param: The Leadtools.RasterImage object containing the image data to convert.
Options to control the conversion operation. The following values can be ORed together:
member.returns: An System.Windows.Media.ImageSource object representing the converted image.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterImageConverter.TestCompatible(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions)
member.summary: Tests a Leadtools.RasterImage to see if it is compatible with the WPF System.Windows.Media.ImageSource.
member.param: The options to use when testing.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterRegionConverter
member.summary: Converts between a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) System.Windows.Media.Geometry objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterRegionConverter.AddGeometryToRegion(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm,Geometry,Leadtools.RasterRegionCombineMode)
member.summary: Creates or updates a LEADTOOLS image region by adding the specified WPF geometry.
member.param: Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates. If you specify null (Nothing in VB) in this parameter, the scalar fields default to 1, the offsets default to 0, and the view perspective defaults to the image view perspective.
The action to take regarding the existing image region, if one is defined.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterRegionConverter.ConvertFromGeometry(Geometry)
member.summary: Converts a WPF System.Windows.Media.Geometry object to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion.
member.param: The WPF source geometry. This parameter cannot be null (Nothing in VB).
member.returns: The LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion object this method creates. You must dispose this object after using it.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Windows.Media.RasterRegionConverter.ConvertToGeometry(Leadtools.RasterRegion,Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm)
member.summary: Converts a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterRegion to a WPF System.Windows.Media.Geometry object.
member.param: The source LEADTOOLS region. This parameter cannot be null (Nothing in VB).
Leadtools.RasterRegionXForm object that LEADTOOLS uses to translate between display coordinates and image coordinates.
member.returns: The Geometry object this method creates.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertFromSourceOptions
member.summary: Options for converting a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) System.Windows.Media.ImageSource to a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertFromSourceOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertFromSourceOptions.UseWritableBitmap
member.summary: Use WriteableBitmap for image data storage.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertFromSourceOptions.AutoDetectAlpha
member.summary: Indicates LEADTOOLS should automatically detect if the image data contains meaningful alpha channel values, and if so, set the RasterImage.PremultiplyAlpha property accordingly.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertFromSourceOptions.FastConvertTo1Bit
member.summary: Fast conversion to 1-bit black on white. Use this flag to convert any System.Windows.Media.ImageSource to a 1-bit per pixel Leadtools.RasterImage object with black on white palette. Useful for quickly converting System.Windows.Media.ImageSource to Leadtools.RasterImage; suitable for barcode or OCR recognition.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions
member.summary: Options for converting a LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object to Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) System.Windows.Media.ImageSource.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions.KeepAlphaValues
member.summary: If the source Leadtools.RasterImage is 32 or 64-bits/pixel, then use the alpha values from this alpha if the result of the conversion is also a 32 or 64-bits/pixel System.Windows.Media.ImageSource.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions.KeepViewPerspective
member.summary: Keep the original Leadtools.RasterImage view perspective. The Leadtools.RasterImage objects supports having an image data orientation other than the normal top-left through the RasterImage.ViewPerspective property.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions.IgnoreLowHighBitsOnGrayImages
member.summary: Do not use the gray scale bit window values when converting 12 or 16-bit grayscale Leadtools.RasterImage objects. The Leadtools.RasterImage object contains the RasterImage.LowBit and RasterImage.HighBit values that can be set to provide a Window into the image data. This is mostly used by medical applications during a window-leveling operations.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions.UseSetSource
member.summary: Note: This option is no longer supported.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ConvertToSourceOptions.AutoDetectAlpha
member.summary: Note: This option is no longer supported.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason
member.summary: Indicates the reason that the LEADTOOLS Leadtools.RasterImage object is not compatible with WPF.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason.Compatible
member.summary: Image is compatible

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Unsupported Bits/Pixel

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason.Order
member.summary: Unsupported color byte order

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason.Palette
member.summary: Unsupported palette

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason.Data
member.summary: Unsupported raw data

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason.ViewPerspective
member.summary: Unsupported view perspective

member.name: F:Leadtools.Windows.Media.ImageIncompatibleReason.Other
member.summary: Unspecified reason
